name: Wego
description:
Wego.com is a travel meta-search engine that makes finding the best priced hotels and flights online easy, thus helping you save time, pay less and travel more.
By joining the Wego Affiliate Network you receive a share of the revenue that our booking partners pay us for every visitor that we send them . Itâ€™s free to join and we offer incentives for extremely good performers.
As a Wego Affiliate you will have access to banners, links, search boxes and the ability to start your own private branded meta-search site using our white-label app. In addition to these, we have APIs that allow you to model your site the way you want it.
Hundreds of Wego Affiliates, both travel and non-travel related sites are already making money by adding Wego to their website strategy. Join the Wego Affiliate Network and you can do the same!
